required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Collagen Complex COLLOST in Anti-age Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Non-interventional Study: Collagen Anti-age Treatment in Routine Clinical Practice

collaborator.agency: Institute of Plastic Surgery and Cosmetology, Moscow, Russia

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates the statistics of anti-age treatment in outpatient sites in Russia (involution indicators: clinical scales; instrumental diagnostics, ultrasonic scannings, assesment of allergic state, efficacy assesment in according with GAIS scale) in routine clinical practice with focus on collagen therapy.

detailed_description.textblock:
This non-interventional study covers 60 patients (females with involuntary changes of the face skin) from Russian sites.
The following data will be collected and analyzed after the end of treatment:
- demography
- assessment of allergic state
- safety data
- severity of aging effect
- clinical scales results before 1visit and after end of treatment
- GAIS effectiveness assessment
- instrumental diagnostic before 1visit and after end of treatment
- hydration
- elasticity
- microcirculation level
- lipofuscin level
- ultrasound scanning
- derma echo density

primary_outcome.measure: Elastisity Ultrasonic scanning of the scin - epidermis and dermis in 3 area of the face after injections of the Collagen and after injections of the Hyaluronic Acid
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate elasticity in Cheek, in forehead and glabella area scanned after each procedure and compare with screening results

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety: to evaluate safety by comparing adverse events after injections of the Collagen and after injections of the Hyaluronic Acid
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate safety by comparing adverse events and their relationships with medical devices

secondary_outcome.measure: Microcirculation data after injections of the Collagen and after injections of the Hyaluronic Acid
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate results after each procedure and after 3 procedures by the laser Doppler fluorimetry

secondary_outcome.measure: 3D photo materials after injections of the Collagen and after injections of the Hyaluronic Acid
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluete results of procedures by the Quantifirecare data

secondary_outcome.measure: GAIS scale data after injections of the Collagen and after injections of the Hyaluronic Acid
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluete results of 1 procedures and after 3 procedures by the patient and by the doctor

arm_group.description: 30 females with aging facial problems from 35 to 65 years old prescribed collagen ingection once every 3 weeks, cours of therapy - 3 procedures
30 females with aging facial problems from 35 to 65 years old prescribed hyaluronic acid ingection once every 3 weeks, cours of therapy - 3 procedures

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- signed Inform Consent Form
- only females
- from 35 to 65 years old
- 1-3 skin photo types
- signs of age-related skin changes
- absence of chronic disease in decompensation phase
- refusal to receive any cosmetic procedures during the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnancy, lactation period
- infection process, dermatoses, censers
- systemic connective tissue diseases with skin and subcutaneous tissue damage
- taking isotretinoin drugs for the previous 6 months
- propensity to form hypertrophic and keloid scars
- exacerbation or decompensation of chronic somatic diseases; infectious and oncological diseases
- violations of blood coagulation, including iatrogenic (taking drugs that affect blood clotting)
- taking antihistamines, glucocorticoids, NSAIDs, immunosuppressants and other drugs that affect the reactivity of the skin
- hypersensitivity to the components of the studied medical device

eligibility.gender_description: Anti-aging therapy more popular for female patients

overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Plastic Surgery and Cosmetology

facility.name: Institute of Plastic Surgery and Cosmetology
